      • setListener

        public void setListener​(CollectionListener l)
        Important that you set a listener if you want to see what was captured. As well as optimize future harvests. Listener tells the collector if the item in question was harvested or not.
        Parameters:
        l - listener to use

      • handleConversion

        public void handleConversion​(ConvertedDocument doc,
                             String filepath)
        Email parser, converter, recorder. This routine handles one message that may have a number of attachments (children) IOException is logged if handling of children documents+conversions fails. TODO: handleConversion should throw IOException or use listener to report errors for this document
        Specified by:
        handleConversion in interface ConversionListener
        Parameters:
        doc - the doc
        filepath - the filepath

      • saveMessageToFile

        protected int saveMessageToFile​(File dateFolder,
                                javax.mail.Message msg,
                                String oid,
                                String fname)
                         throws IOException,
                                javax.mail.MessagingException
        A very specific MESSAGE ->> FILE archiving method. Mail item will end up in: YYYYMMDD/MSGID/SUBJ.eml .. the original email. YYYYMMDD/MSGID/SUBJ_eml/ .. attachments here..
        Parameters:
        dateFolder - the date folder
        msg - javamail message
        oid - message ID
        fname - file name to save message
        Returns:
        0 on success, -1 on error
        Throws:
        IOException - unknown I/O error.
        javax.mail.MessagingException - the messaging exception
